tuv.seg: The Commercial Court is a division of the High Court and was established in 2004 to provide efficient and effective dispute resolution in commercial cases
Is cuid den Ard-Chúirt é an Chúirt Tráchtála agus bunaíodh í sa bhliain 2004 chun taifeach díospóide feidhmiúla agus éifeachtaí a sholáthar i gcásanna tráchtála
It is governed by Order 63A of the Rules of the Superior Courts in particular
Tá sé rialaithe ag Ordú 63A de Rialacha na nUaschúirteanna ach go háirithe
The Commercial Court deals with the following type of business disputes:
Déileálann an Chúirt Tráchtála leis na cineálacha díospóidí gnó seo a leanas:
• Disputes of a commercial nature between commercial bodies where the value of the claim is at least €1 million
• Díospóidí de bhunú tráchtála idir eagraíochtaí tráchtála nuair atá luach an éilimh ar a laghad €1 milliún
• Proceedings under the Arbitration Act 2010 with a value of at least €1 million
• Cásanna faoin Acht Eadrána le luach de €1 milliún ar a laghad
• Disputes concerning intellectual property
• Díospóidí maidir le maoin intleachtúil
• Appeals from or applications for judicial review of regulatory decisions
• Achomhairc ó nó iarratais ar athbhreithniú breithiúnach de bhreitheanna rialála

• Proceedings in connection with any function of the Registrar under the Cape Town Convention or the Aircraft Protocol as defined in the International Interests in Mobile Equipment (Cape Town Convention) Act 2005

• Imeachtaí gaolta le haon fheidhm den Chláraitheoir faoin gCoinbhinsiún Cape Town nó an Comhghnás Aerárthaí mar atá sainithe san Acht um Leasanna Idirnáisiúnta i dTrealamh Soghluaiste (Coinbhinsiún Cape Town) 2005
• Other cases a judge of the Commercial Court considers appropriate
• Cásanna eile a mheasann breitheamh na Cúirte Tráchtála a bheith cuí
There is no automatic right of entry to the Commercial List of the High Court
Níl aon cheart dhul isteach uathoibríoch ar Liosta Tráchtála na hArd-Chúirte
It is at the discretion of a judge of the Commercial Court
Tá sé faoi dhiscréid bhreitheamh na Cúirte Tráchtála
The Court uses a detailed case management system that is designed to streamline the preparation for trial, remove unnecessary costs and stalling tactics, and ensure full pre-trial disclosure

Baineann an Chúirt úsáid as córas bainistithe cáis mhin atá deartha chun an ullmhúchán do thriail a luathú, costais nach bhfuil ag teastáil agus beartaíochtaí loichte a bhaint den phróiseas, agus nochtadh réamh-thrialach iomláin a chinntiú
The judge can adjourn proceedings for up to 28 days to allow resolution of the dispute through some form of alternative dispute resolution, such as mediation, conciliation or arbitration

Is féidir leis an mbreitheamh imeachtaí a chur ar athló go dtí suas go 28 lá chun taifeach na díospóide a éascú trí thaifeach díospóide de shaghas éigin eile, cosúil le hidirghabháil, idir-réiteach nó eadráin
